results.text: Your word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.
results.reflection: God's word illuminates our path in a dark world.

results.text: Give us today our daily bread.
results.reason: Trust in God for daily provision.
results.reflection: Rely on God to provide for our daily needs.

results.text: The steadfast love of the Lord never ceases; his mercies never come to an end; they are new every morning; great is your faithfulness.
results.reflection: God's faithfulness and mercy are fresh each morning.

results.text: Trust in the Lord with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; in all your ways submit to him, and he will make your paths straight.
results.reflection: Surrendering our ways to God leads to straight paths.

results.text: Teach us to number our days, that we may gain a heart of wisdom.
results.reflection: Understanding the brevity of life leads to wisdom.
